nodes.bodyText: Useless, the properties page use a PropertyStore, not this one
Useless, the properties page use a PropertyStore, not this one

Yes, I agree that it's strange to save project preferences using both ProjectScope (saved in project .settings) and IProject.getPersistentProperty (saved in the workspace with the path to the project). But it was like this before, so I think we could keep the same code.
